title: National Assembly By-Elections (Kabushi Constituency No. 36 and Kwacha Constituency No. 22) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 3) Order, 2022
content:
12th October, 2022 Statutory Instruments 915
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 64 OF 2022
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The National Assembly By-Elections (Kabushi
Constituency No. 36 and Kwacha Constituency No. 22)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No.3) Order, 2022
WHEREAS in pursuance of Article 72(8) of the Constitution of Cap. 1
Zambia, the Speaker of the National Assembly has informed the
Electoral Commission of Zambia of the vacancies in respect of
Kabushi Constituency No. 36 seat held by Mr. Bowman Lusambo
and Kwacha Constituency No. 22 seat held by Mr. Joe Malanji by
reason of nullification of Kwacha Constituency and Kabushi
Constituency National Assembly Elections by the Constitutional
Court, and the declaration by the Speaker of the National Assembly
of the vacancies of the Parliamentary seats in respect of Kwacha
Constituency and Kabushi Constituency:
Now therefore, in exercise of the powers contained in Article Cap. 1
57(3) of the Constitution and section 28 of the Electoral Process Act No. 35
Act, 2016, the following Order is made: of 2016
1. This Order may be cited as the National Assembly By- Title
Elections (Kabushi Constituency No. 36 and Kwacha Constituency
No. 22) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No.3) Order, 2022.
2. The campaign period shall continue in the Kabushi Campaign
Constituency No. 36 and Kwacha Constituency No. 22 from the period
date of notification of the poll day in the Gazette and close at 18:00
hours on Thursday, 20th October, 2022.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O.Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka Price K4.00 each
916 Statutory Instruments 12th October, 2022
Election date 3. The polls for the election of a Member of Parliament in the
and time of Kabushi and Kwacha Constituencies referred to in paragraph 2
poll shall take place on Friday, 21st October, 2022, between 06:00
hours and 18:00 hours.
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this
11th day of October, 2022.
D. SIMWINGA,
Member
V. M. MUNKANDA,
Member
LUSAKA N. M. MUTTI,
11th October, 2022 Member
[EC/101/5/2 CONF.]
